name: New Look T-Shirt
description: This Men's Fashion T-Shirt is crafted from premium, breathable cotton, offering ultimate comfort and style. Featuring a modern fit and durable stitching, it's perfect for everyday wear or a casual outing. Available in multiple sizes and designed to maintain its shape and color after washing.

name: Modern Fit Shirt
description: A versatile and comfortable casual shirt with a modern fit, ideal for various occasions. Made from high-quality fabric that ensures breathability and durability.

name: Floral Summer Dress
description: Embrace the summer with this elegant floral dress. Its lightweight material and vibrant print make it a perfect choice for sunny days and outdoor events.

name: Classic Denim Jacket
description: A timeless classic, this denim jacket offers both style and comfort. Perfect for layering, it's a durable piece that complements any casual outfit.

name: Striped Polo Shirt
description: Elevate your casual look with this stylish striped polo shirt. Made from soft, breathable fabric, it's comfortable for all-day wear and features a classic design.

name: Utility Cargo Pants
description: Practical and fashionable, these utility cargo pants are designed for comfort and functionality. Multiple pockets provide ample storage, while the durable fabric ensures longevity.

name: Bohemian Flowy Blouse
description: Discover effortless style with this bohemian flowy blouse. Its relaxed fit and intricate details make it a perfect addition for a chic, comfortable look.

name: Urban Graphic Tee
description: Express your style with this urban graphic tee. Featuring a unique design and soft cotton fabric, it's comfortable and stands out in any casual setting.

name: Blue Casual Shirt
description: A classic blue casual shirt, perfect for everyday wear. Made from breathable fabric, it offers comfort and a timeless look.

name: Green Casual Shirt
description: This green casual shirt is a fresh addition to your wardrobe. Its comfortable fit and vibrant color make it suitable for various casual outings.

name: White Casual Shirt
description: A crisp white casual shirt, essential for any wardrobe. Its clean design and comfortable fabric make it versatile for both relaxed and semi-formal occasions.

name: Patterned Casual Shirt
description: Stand out with this stylish patterned casual shirt. Its unique design and comfortable material ensure you look good and feel great.

name: Denim Casual Shirt
description: A durable and fashionable denim casual shirt. Perfect for a rugged yet stylish look, it's a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down.

name: Grey Casual Shorts
description: Comfortable and practical grey casual shorts, ideal for warm weather. Made from soft fabric, they are perfect for everyday activities or lounging.

name: Brown Casual Shirt
description: This brown casual shirt offers a warm and earthy tone to your collection. Its relaxed fit and soft fabric ensure maximum comfort.

name: Black Casual Shirt
description: A sleek black casual shirt, a must-have for any wardrobe. Its simple yet elegant design makes it suitable for various occasions, offering both style and comfort.
